name: Partner Dice Exit
description:
Partner Dice Exit is a puzzle game which neta Portal(XD)

Partner Dice has escaped from being cremated, you need to help it get out of GLaDOES’s secret room.

Use WASD/↑←↓→ to move.

Press the heart block with the CORRESPONDING SIDE of the dice.

If you want to quit the game, Press Alt+F4.

Have fun!

Game Designer: yy, Kirmy

Programmer: vc, Ica Huang 

Game Artist: Zee, oOOozZZz
